edge: The text mentions 'HERE IS THE DETAILS OF MOVIE'S PRODUCTION:'. 'Gujarati House' is identified as the title of this movie. Hence, 'Gujarati House' and 'film' are related.
The director wasn't satisfied with the voice for the dumb portions. As a result, Dileep turned dubbing artiste. This establishes that 'Dileep' and 'dubbing artiste' are related.
The text mentions Dileep as a star of the original film Punjabi House. Hence, 'Punjabi House' and 'original film' are related.
